dict.acceptation: 被解雇的；失业的；不在使用中的；未用的；

sent.orig: Got one-time findplace for the unemployed worker of cost, cannot enjoy unemployed insurance treatment again.
sent.trans: 领取了一次性安置费的失业职工，不能再享受失业保险待遇。

sent.orig: Unsecured unemployed personal loan is designed to help the unemployed people who can not afford loan.
sent.trans: 对失业人员的贷款为失业人士提供个人或无担保。

sent.orig: Answer: Unemployed personnel cannot enjoy unemployed insurance treatment below the circumstance of active abdication.
sent.trans: 答：失业人员在主动辞职的情况下不能享受失业保险待遇。

sent.orig: The unemployed engineer wrote a dozen applications for jobs but go nothing.
sent.trans: 失业的工程师一连写了十几封求职信，但一无所获。

sent.orig: Hu Jia is self-employed right now, or as the police put it, urban unemployed.
sent.trans: 胡佳现在是自由职业者，抑或警方所言的”城市无业人员”。
